name: Holy Shock
description: Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing ${powerMin} to ${powerMax} Holy damage to an enemy, or ${powerMin} to ${powerMax} healing to an ally.

author.name: Ozgar
author.description: Founder and creator of Ozgar's Downranking Guide & Tool.

notes.note: You should always use the Max Rank of this spell. Holy shock is not very mana efficient nor very powerful when it comes to reliable healing over time, both due to its cooldown, but also since it is an instant spell it does not scale very well with Healing Power.
